schema.title: Storybook Dev Builder
schema.description: Serve up Storybook in development mode.

staticDir.description: Directory where to load static files from, array of strings.
staticDir.x-deprecated: In Storybook 6.4 the `--static-dir` CLI flag has been replaced with the the `staticDirs` field in `.storybook/main.js`. It will be removed completely in Storybook 7.0.

configDir.description: Directory where to load Storybook configurations from.

https.description: Serve Storybook over HTTPS. Note: You must provide your own certificate information.

ci.description: CI mode (skip interactive prompts, don't open browser).

loglevel.description: Controls level of logging during build. Can be one of: [silly, verbose, info (default), warn, error, silent].

docs.description: Starts Storybook in documentation mode. Learn more about it : https://storybook.js.org/docs/react/writing-docs/build-documentation#preview-storybooks-documentation.

docsMode.description: Starts Storybook in documentation mode. Learn more about it : https://storybook.js.org/docs/react/writing-docs/build-documentation#preview-storybooks-documentation.
